title: Manchester Arndale stabbings live: Terror police probe after five people knifed
text:
Five people have been stabbed at the Arndale centre in central Manchester.

Pictures and video on social media show large numbers of officers at the scene.

Counter terror police at Greater Manchester Police are leading the investigation.

Emergency services were called to the scene at 11.17am today.

A police statement said: "Specialist officers are continuing to respond to an incident at the Arndale shopping centre in Manchester city centre.

"We can confirm that five people have been stabbed and taken to hospital.

"In these early stages we are keeping an open mind about the motivation of this terrible incident and the circumstances as we know them"

Are you at the Manchester Arndale centre? Email webnews@mirror.co.uk
description: Greater Manchester Police have swooped on the Arndale centre in central Manchester after reports of multiple stabbings
